tasks.title: MyFatoorah Integration
tasks.description: Integrate MyFatoorah payment gateway on the checkout page so users can make purchases.

tasks.title: Vendor ID Input Field
tasks.description: Add a Vendor ID input field on the admin frontend to enable multi-vendor creation on MyFatoorah portal.

tasks.title: Vendor API Integration
tasks.description: Create an API to add vendors, save them in the database, and validate if the Vendor ID already exists on MyFatoorah (manually created by admin).

tasks.title: Modon Express Sync Meeting
tasks.description: Discuss synchronization strategies for Modon Express project.

tasks.description: Deploy the Alhai development server and execute database migrations to ensure the latest
